translations: adj．使生气勃勃的，使活跃的：使某事物或某人变得更有活力、更有趣。
· The enlivening music made everyone want to dance.
这激发活力的音乐让每个人都想跳舞。

phrs.translation: 搞活经济, 放活经济
提升活力提神身体啫喱
是你们给它带来了活跃气氛

sentences.sentence: To add an enlivening or altering element to.
sentences.translation: 增加使活跃或变换的因素。

sentences.sentence: The flat, pastel pictures add enlivening details to the repetitive text.
sentences.translation: 平坦的，柔和的图片添加搞活细节的重复文本。

sentences.sentence: I have also observed that these enlivening energies sometimes stir things up inside me.
sentences.translation: 我还注意到，这些让人生气勃勃的能量有时会唤起我内在的事物。
